name: Rock-Paper-Scissors-Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
This tiny game was for the lowres jam, and it is my first attempt at doing a multiplayer game as an HTML5 build.

Don't forget to full screen it (the one here and the other link on screen once you read the instructions).

You need to be on the results screen in order for the chip button to work for a replay.

The multiplayer is disabled here at itch.io it seems, so maybe it is blocking my http calls to the external server's PHP script. 

There may be a way around it, and I am not sure since I have not posted many games here yet.

I do have some NPC characters built in for instances when a match could not be found., so it is still playable as it is.

Have fun!
